title: Bloom Studs - Mogra Design Diamond and Emerald Karna Phool
features: Inspired by the classic Mogra flower, these studs feature intricate filigree work in gold. The central Emerald is surrounded by a halo of sparkling Diamonds. The openwork design lends a delicate and airy feel, making them comfortable for all-day wear. Crafted with meticulous detail and a Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
occasions: Perfect for everyday wear or special occasions like festivals
or as an elegant addition to your office attire. Also suitable as a thoughtful gift.
description: The delicate Mogra flower design embodies beauty and purity. The combination of Emerald and Diamonds provides a touch of regal charm, and the high-quality materials ensure longevity. A timeless design, perfect for adding a touch of traditional elegance to any outfit. It reflects traditional Hyderabad jewelry design.
